Rules:
 1. In each level you were given a jumbled word and you have to type the correct word in the given text field
 2. Once you enter the word, check whether the word is correct or not by using the validate button
 3. You can also use hint button for the hint to display on the screen which will reduce your points by 5
 4. At any point of time you may leave the game by clicking end game which will take you to your score card 5. For example, level contains 3 letter word and level 2 contains 3 letter word.
 6. The score will be increaded by 100 points as you move to next level
 7. There are bonus points if you clear a level without hint 
 8. You can view your score in the leader board position
 9. Once you clear all the 10 levels, a score card wil be displayed
 10.If you click on show the leader board button the leader board will be displayed on the screen
